subject: Dakar Rally
Traffic Accidents and Safety
Deaths (Fatalities)
Automobiles
lead_paragraph: The Argentine bike rider Jorge Martínez Boero died after a crash on the first day of the Dakar Rally, a 15-day race from Argentina to Peru.
snippet: The Argentine bike rider Jorge Martínez Boero died after a crash on the first day of the Dakar Rally, a 15-day race from Argentina to Peru.
